Keywords: Animal , Illuminati , Scientist , X-Force , X-Men
Real Name: Hank McCoy
Team Up
01
TEAM UP: ANGEL, ARCHANGEL, CYCLOPS, ICEMAN, JEAN GREY, MARVEL GIRL: If 2+ listed friendly characters are on the map, Beast and listed friendly characters can use the X-Men Team Ability as FREE. If 4+ are on the map, when they use it, heal 2 clicks isntead. (After revealing forces, you may replace a game element's default card with an alternate card. You can't choose a Team Up card if any characters on your starting force share a name).
02
TEAM UP: X-MEN THEMED TEAM: [After establishing themed teams, if Beast is part of a listed theme team, you may use the following effect:] If 3+ friendly characters with the X-Men keyword are on the map, Beast and friendly adjacent characters have PROTECTED: Poison. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can�t choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
Special Powers
THE MUTANT C.I.A.: Stealth. Improved Movement: Hindering. Improved Targeting: Hindering.
FIVE STEPS AHEAD: When an opposing character takes a FREE action, give Beast a Planning token. // FREE: Remove 2 Planning tokens to remove an action token from a friendly character with the X-Men keyword.

January 17, 2021
tyroclix
WIN/LOSS: 0-1 Unique Beast is a fantastic support piece. Mutant CIA keeps his head down and can be used to allow him to use his Outwit but his entire value is in collecting Planning Tokens (record 6). Giving a character a form of Willpower or allowing a critical attack to happen is really invaluable. I'd recommend having a taxi nearby to bring up the Beast to Outwit side-step away, remove a token and then attack the target while keeping Hank safe. Another suggestion, clearing a token even at the end of you turn is a good way to benefit from Beast in case he gets KO'd. I'll be using this one a lot, I think. EDIT 2021: Well that was a short ride. Beast's value has diminished a little in 2021. Still useful - but not as useful as when he just came out.
